data.name: The Break-In Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is an early demo for The Break-In! A 1-4 player online co-op burglary game about sneaking in, taking everything, and then sneaking out. Infiltrate houses, bank vaults and museums to earn money and upgrade your thief gear.

The demo shows off some of the early game missions and gear, allowing you to break into houses and steal whatever you can, all while avoiding the residents and the police.

Current demo features:
  • Wide range of gadgets: Equip yourself with items ranging from old ladders to high-power grapple guns.
  • Natural climbing system: Clamber up drainpipes, squeeze through windows, or make your way to the roof to get a birds-eye view.
  • 1-4 player co-op: Bring your friends along for extra pairs of thieving hands. Just make sure they're quiet, or they'll alert the residents.
  • Randomised level generation:. Hit a new house each time you play, so you'll always have to be on your toes.
  • VR / non-VR crossplay: VR adds an extra layer of immersion, but you can play fully without it too! Cross-play allows you to play alongside VR players, even in flatscreen mode.

data.short_description: The Break-In is a 1-4 player online co-op burglary game about sneaking in, taking everything, and then sneaking out. Infiltrate houses, bank vaults and museums to earn money and upgrade your thief gear.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
